name: Topplin'
description:
Topplin' is a physics puzzle game with a minimalist art style. 

Features:

  • Two different modes with 25 levels each
  • Use a mouse to place pins and complete the objective
  • 50 total levels
  • Quiet ambient track
  • Simple graphics
  • Around 4 hours of gameplay*

Tower Mode

  • Place pins to keep a tower from falling
  • Keep the tower up for a specified amount of time to beat that level
  • If an object falls the timer resets
  • You have to use a specific amount of pins to get all 3 stars

Basket Mode

  • Place pins to get a colored ball into its colored basket
  • You will be scored on how long it takes to get all marbles into a basket
  • Multiple colored marbles, and multiple colored baskets
  • You have to use a specific amount of pins to get all 3 stars

Controls

  • Left click to place pins
  • Right click to delete pins

Download Instructions

  • Download the zip file
  • Extract the file using the program of your choice
  • To launch the game, run "Topplin.exe"
  • Do NOT move the exe file from that folder, instead, right click it and make a shortcut file

-A game by Adam Baker

(Also available on GameJolt.com!)
